Reviews.Title: “A very good choice for the budget traveller.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights brief simple quiet hotel targeting business travellers satisfied stay following reasons 1 value money 2 standard conventional warm clean 3 satisfying simple breakfast 4 italian reasonably priced wine bars frequented locals 5 quiet street minus location 3 bustram stops metro station frequency roman transport system bus 35 minutes deal afterall found site prices offered lower offers booking sites save extra 2 person dinner excellent pizzeria street
